metadata.name: LOST POETS Essential Guide
metadata.description:
this ledgerdust genesis piece was minted on Saturday February 5th, 2022. 50 editions were stealth minted for ASH collectors. After a week-long buying opportunity for 10 Ash, all the unsold copies were burned and a visual update to the guide was was revealed.

the image is a living and changing guide to the LOST POETS collection by Pak, and will be updated to include future updates to their collection until September 5th, 2022. hopefully it's so good that you right click save it to share with your confused homies. LOST POETS = life
